title: LEAVING WATER 7 to ENIES LOBBY!! One Piece Episode 254, 255 & 256 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Unknown
description: A reaction and review video covering One Piece episodes 254-256, focusing on the transition from Water 7 to Enies Lobby and the Aqua Laguna events.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for episodes up to 256

title: Aqua Laguna Arrives! One Piece REACTION!! Episodes 254, 255 & 256
author: The Phazecast
description: The Phazecast reviews episodes 254-256, discussing the Aqua Laguna destroying Water 7's backstreets and the Straw Hats' decision to pursue Robin to Enies Lobby.

title: 254 - 255: 'Nami's Soul Cries Out! Straw Hat Luffy Makes a Comeback!' and 'Another Sea Train? Rocketman Charges Forth!'
author: neverwatchedonepiece
description: A detailed written review of episodes 254-255, praising the action sequences and describing the Aqua Laguna as 'skyscraper high waves that destroyed the back street district.'

title: Episode 254 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 254 containing plot summary, character debuts, staff credits, trivia, and adaptation notes.

title: Funkfreed - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Character page for Funkfreed, detailing his debut, abilities, Devil Fruit powers, and relationship with Spandam.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information about Funkfreed's appearances throughout the series

title: Water 7 Arc - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive arc page detailing the Water 7 Arc story, characters, and episode breakdown.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for entire Water 7 Arc

title: Chapter 363 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Manga chapter page for Chapter 363 'Aqua Laguna', one of the chapters adapted in Episode 254.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains manga chapter information adapted in episode 254

title: One Piece - Episode 254: Nami's Soul Cries Out! Straw Hat Luffy Makes a Comeback!
author: Toei Animation
description: Official streaming source for Episode 254 on Crunchyroll.

title: Zou Zou no Mi - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Devil Fruit page detailing the Zou Zou no Mi (Elephant-Elephant Fruit) that debuted in Episode 254.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information about the Devil Fruit throughout the series

title: Kokoro no Chizu - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Information page about the opening song 'Kokoro no Chizu' by BOYSTYLE, which plays in Episode 254.

title: Dear Friends - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Information page about the ending song 'Dear Friends' by TRIPLANE, dedicated to the Going Merry. This is the last episode in which this ending plays (episodes 246-255).

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: The song is dedicated to Going Merry and plays during Merry's funeral in episode 312
